unit_abilities.Stand Vigil: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.
unit_abilities.Sentinel Storm: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can shoot again.

wargear_abilities.Praesidium Shield: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.
wargear_abilities.Vexilla: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 sentinel blade and 1 praesidium shield.

unit_abilities.Resolute Will: While a Character is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
unit_abilities.Living Fortress: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

wargear_abilities.Vexilla: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

unit_abilities.Slayers of Tyrants: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Character, Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
unit_abilities.From Golden Light: Once per battle, at the end of your  opponenet’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

unit_abilities.Master of the Stances: At the start of the Fight phase, select one Ka’tah Stance. unit_abilities.Defiant to the Last: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

unit_abilities.Sweeping Advance: While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit Consolidates, each model in that unit can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, once per battle, at the end of the Fight phase, if this model’s unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can Fall Back as if it were your Movement phase or, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move as if it were your Movement phase.
